general_advisory: Looking at the upcoming rainfall events, farmers should manage their agricultural practices. Summer ploughing should be done in the field across the slope with specialized tools for opening the soil crust and overturning the soil to kill the weeds and recharge the soil during the pre-monsoon showers. Make field bunds to conserve water in the field. Prepare the beds for nursery management and further transplanting.

advisory: Looking at the upcoming monsoon events, start preparing for nursery bed preparation in rice. Before nursery sowing, treat the seeds with Carbendazim or Mancozeb @2gram/kg of seed.
Disease - chilli bacterial leaf spot. Spray mancozeb @ 2 g/l or copper oxychloride @ 2.5 g/l. Field sanitation is also important.

Stage - maturity to harvest. Dip the fruits in 52 ± 1°C hot water immediately after harvest for 5 minutes followed by 8% plant wax (Fruitox or Waxol) to reduce anthracnose disease in mango during storage. Two pre-harvest sprays of 0.20% Mancozeb (2.0 g/lit) will also reduce the incidence.
Keep the shed clean and dry. Provide fresh drinking water. Vaccinate the cattle in proper time intervals.
